H0.text: Who is credited with the discovery of the tomb of King Tutankhamen in 1922. Flinders Petrie

H1.text: Who is credited with the discovery of the tomb of King Tutankhamen in 1922. Zahi Hawass

H2.text: Who is credited with the discovery of the tomb of King Tutankhamen in 1922. Giovanni Belzoni

H3.text: Who is credited with the discovery of the tomb of King Tutankhamen in 1922. Howard Carter

A4.text: Howard Carter discovered the intact tomb of Tutankhamun in November 1922.
